net.sf.sprockets.google

Class LocalPlacesParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.sprockets.google.Places.Params
      • net.sf.sprockets.google.LocalPlacesParams

  • public class LocalPlacesParams
extends Places.Params
    Params whose location is automatically set to the current location when supplied to one of the Places methods. The constructor and setter methods do not block and can be called on the UI thread.

    Requires the ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION (or FINE) permission.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class net.sf.sprockets.google.Places.Params

        Places.Params.RankBy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalPlacesParams(Context context)
      By default, the best most recent location or, if none are available, the current coarse location will be set before sending the Places request.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocalPlacesParams

        public LocalPlacesParams(Context context)
        By default, the best most recent location or, if none are available, the current coarse location will be set before sending the Places request.

    • Method Detail

      • priority

        public LocalPlacesParams priority(int priority)
        Request the current location with the specific priority.
        Parameters:
        priority - must be one of the LocationRequest PRIORITY constants

      • required

        public LocalPlacesParams required(boolean required)
        Require a location before sending the request. If set to false, the request can be sent immediately, possibly without a location, and when a location is received it will be set for future requests. For example, this could be useful if you would like to send the first autocomplete requests as soon as possible and allow the location to be added later.

      • format

        public String format(Places.Request type)
        Get a URL formatted for the type of request. If required is true (the default), this method will block until a location has been received.
        Overrides:
        format in class Places.Params
